dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle new challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new challenges with a cautious and methodical mindset, weighing risks before taking action.
Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges with an adventurous spirit, seeking excitement and thrill in every endeavor.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze problems systematically, using logic and evidence-based reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to navigate complex problems, trusting their gut feelings and hunches.

dimensions.label: Technical Savvy
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly proficient in using technology, leveraging their skills to streamline processes and improve efficiency.
Your FarTwin will have basic familiarity with technology, using it as a tool to accomplish tasks but not necessarily being an expert user.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and budgeting, making prudent financial decisions to achieve long-term stability.
Your FarTwin will be more likely to indulge in luxury items and experiences, viewing them as investments in their overall happiness and well-being.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach international issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus primarily on local concerns, potentially overlooking broader global implications and consequences.
Your FarTwin will take a holistic approach to international issues, considering the interconnectedness of global events and their potential impact.

dimensions.label: Lifelong Learning
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin continue to educate themselves?

options.description: Your FarTwin will pursue advanced education and training with dedication, continually seeking to expand their knowledge and skills.
Your FarTwin will have a general interest in learning new things, but may not prioritize formal education or extensive reading.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will assertively express their opinions and needs, potentially becoming confrontational if necessary.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground and try to find mutually beneficial solutions, prioritizing harmony over individual interests.

dimensions.label: Home Life Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach domestic responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize establishing routines and maintaining a sense of structure in their home life, valuing stability over spontaneity.
Your FarTwin will be more open to adapting to changing circumstances and embracing flexibility in their domestic routine.
